column4: A classic Italian dish featuring al dente pasta generously coated in a rich, savory Bolognese sauce.

column4: This wholesome Italian classic is crafted with a medley of fresh vegetables, including diced carrots, celery, zucchini, and green beans, simmered in a flavorful vegetable broth.
